rows.label: qev086002_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmm? No, haven't noticed any transmission loss
in the energy system recently...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0002
rows.name:
But it's in the readings!
Please, you have to check one more time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0003
rows.name: Meh! Jargon flies over very short head of Tatsu...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0004
rows.name: NLA used to be the residential area of a spaceship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0005
rows.name: We're standing in what was the outer wall.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0006
rows.name:
Since we no longer need positional thrusters,
we rerouted that energy elsewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0007
rows.name: Now it travels from the main— Um...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0008
rows.name: Basically, it's leaking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0009
rows.name: Lin patched it up, but it's still leaking a little bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0010
rows.name: Ahh, Tatsu knows all about leaking! Now Tatsu get it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0012
rows.name: What is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0013
rows.name:
Ah. I guess it's been a while since you've seen
Lin fix things instead of shoot them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0014
rows.name: Surprised?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev086002_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask if she's always done both.

rows.label: qev086002_JNK0020
rows.name: Grin

rows.label: qev086002_SEL0021
rows.name: Comment on how much fun she seems to be having.

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0015
rows.name:
She started out as a full-time engineer, actually.
Combat came later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0016
rows.name: I'm afraid we pushed her into it, but BLADE needed the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0017
rows.name: You can tell she loves it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0018
rows.name: But she understands, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0018_2
rows.name:
The different parts we all need to play
for us to survive on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0019
rows.name:
Still, given the choice, I'm sure she'd
lay down her weapons for this in a heartbeat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0020
rows.name:
Back on the White Whale,
Lin was a key part of the engineering team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0021
rows.name:
During the crash, she stayed with
the engines until the very last moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0022
rows.name:
Despite her age, no one can question
her skill or her dedication.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0023
rows.name: If she says something's wrong with the system here, there is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0024
rows.name:
I've finally pinned it down.
It's a problem with the replacement part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0025
rows.name: The one you installed before?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0026
rows.name: Right. Turns out it was made here in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0027
rows.name:
Unfortunately, the quality doesn't match the
Earth-made parts we had on the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0028
rows.name: I suppose it makes sense that it wouldn't.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0029
rows.name:
But if we're lucky, a usable part may have
landed somewhere in Starfall Basin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0030
rows.name:
If Linly say so, then Team Tatsu will go!
Sooner friends fix leak, sooner Tatsu can eat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086002_MSG0031
rows.name: Well, you all heard him—guess we better get a move on.[ST:wait ]
